titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to suspend the minimum planting requirement for the 1987 crop of certain agricultural commodities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to suspend 50 percent minimum planting requirements for the 1987 crops of wheat, feed grains, rice, and cotton. Prohibits haying and grazing on additional acreage.
